CALICE::AhcCern2010TempProvider

CALICE::AhcCern2010TempProvider Class Reference

This is a temperature provider for the AHCAL.based on the studies of the temperature profiles from CERN 2010 data. More...

#include <AhcCern2010TempProvider.hh>

Detailed Description

This is a temperature provider for the AHCAL.based on the studies of the temperature profiles from CERN 2010 data.

Definition at line 15 of file AhcCern2010TempProvider.hh.

Member Function Documentation

float CALICE::AhcCern2010TempProvider::getCellTemp ( int  module,
int  chip,
int  chan 
) [virtual]

Returns the temperature for the cell in the specified module connected to the given chip and channel.

This is only the definition of the interface, a concrete funtion has to be implemented in a derived class. Note: Modules are counted from 1! The valid range for module numbers thus is 1 to 38.

Implements CALICE::AhcTempProvider.

int  chip,
int  chan 
) [virtual]

Returns the error on the temperature for the cell in the specified module connected to the given chip and channel.

This is only the definition of the interface, a concrete funtion has to be implemented in a derived class. Note: Modules are counted from 1! The valid range for module numbers thus is 1 to 38.

int CALICE::AhcCern2010TempProvider::getSensor ( int  chip,
int  chan 
)

Returns the closest sensor to cell connected to chip, chan according to DESY-THESIS-2008-050.

For the connection between the tile, chip and temperature sensors numbers, see http://www.desy.de/~richters/IJ-to-chip-channel/
